ing: 1 (3 ounce) package tropical fruit-flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
des: "Here's a fun and easy recipe for a summer party special! Use any flavor gelatin mix. Pour into small paper cups or ice cube trays so you can shoot 'em back in one  gulp."
ins: In a medium bowl combine the gelatin mix and boiling water. Stir until gelatin dissolves. Pour in the vodka and stir. Pour into small paper cups and chill in the refrigerate until set.
